A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wish that I could have put a zero.  This is a terrible film\, They throw away every setup that was given to them from the force awakens. Side plots are irrelevant and off putting. At first I thought that Rian Johnson was just a talentless hack\, but now I actually think that he did this on purpose.  He wanted to destroy everyone's expectations for some reason.  This is such a slap in the face to Star Wars that I really wish that Disney would just come out and just pull the film and basically retract it from history\, deny all involvement\, hire a new director\, and just make a completely new film and we could all just pretend like this didn't happen. I'll go along with the facade Disney. Let's do this\, I'm with you
